Articles.Content: Hi all, when you place a node and it has the different directions, if you right click the centre of the circle it changes and has 3 icons - one is an x to delete, but what are the other two for?![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

"+" = advance one orbit, "-" = back one orbit.

That is, when you place it KSP assumes you mean next time you reach that point. If you're doing something like a rendezvous you might not want to transfer to the target orbit until after two, three or more orbits. That's when you use the +/-
